alt: The Cloister at Quattro santi coronati, Rome
caption: This relatively unknown Roman [church](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Santi_Quattro_Coronati) dates back to the fourth or fifth century, and is devoted to four anonymous saints and martyrs. It includes two courtyards, the fortified Cardinal Palace with the Saint Silvester Chapel, and the monastery, pictured here, with its cosmatesque cloister
camera: iPhone 7 Plus back dual camera 6.6mm f/2.8
